pages.title: Day 1 — Gion
pages.text: Arrived to gentle rain and lantern‑lit alleys. First matcha. Crowds thinned as the sky turned violet.

photos.alt: Lanterns in Gion alley at dusk
photos.caption: Dusk in Gion

pages.title: Day 2 — Arashiyama
pages.text: Bamboo grove before sunrise. River mist, then hot tofu by the bridge. Day ended with a quiet tram ride.

pages.title: Day 3 — Philosopher’s Path
pages.text: Petals along the canal like confetti. Small temples and a very curious cat.
